org.ssa4j.enterprise
Class EnterpriseScrapeScriptDeployer

java.lang.Object
  org.ssa4j.ScrapeScriptDeployer
      org.ssa4j.enterprise.EnterpriseScrapeScriptDeployer

public class EnterpriseScrapeScriptDeployer
extends ScrapeScriptDeployer

Implementation of ScrapeSessionManager that wraps the screen-scraper SOAP APIs that are exposed as part of the Enterprise edition of screen-scraper.

Author:
Rodney Aiglstorfer
